title: Add Submit Your Review section with form and confirmation

requirements.text: Create a new SubmitReview component that displays a section with header 'Share Your Experience!' and subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.' with bilingual support (English and Bengali)

quotes: We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.

acceptanceCriteria: Component renders section header and subtitle
Text content switches between English and Bengali using LanguageContext
Styling matches existing brand theme (gold/yellow text, dark background, maroon accents)

requirements.text: Implement review submission form in SubmitReview component with fields: Full Name (required text input), Class/Year (required text input), Subject(s) Studied (optional text input), Your Review (required textarea), and Rating (optional 1-5 star selector with clickable star icons)
acceptanceCriteria: All five form fields render with correct input types
Required fields (Full Name, Class/Year, Review) display validation on submission
Star rating uses interactive star icons (1-5) that highlight on hover and click
Form labels are bilingual
Mobile-friendly with large touch targets

requirements.text: Add Submit Review button to the form that validates required fields and displays confirmation message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' as a toast notification on successful submission

quotes: Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.

acceptanceCriteria: Submit button validates Full Name, Class/Year, and Review fields before submission
Success toast displays with confirmation message after submission
Form clears after successful submission
Button text is bilingual

requirements.text: Store submitted reviews in backend using Motoko actor with stable storage, including fields: fullName (Text), classYear (Text), subjects (optional Text), review (Text), rating (optional Nat8), timestamp (Int), and approved (Bool for moderation)

quotes: reviews can be moderated before appearing publicly

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes submitReview method accepting all form fields
Reviews stored with unique ID in stable Map structure
Approved field defaults to false for moderation support
Timestamp automatically added on submission

requirements.text: Style SubmitReview component using clean card layout with borders or subtle shadow, consistent spacing, mobile-responsive design, and hover effects matching existing components

quotes: Use a clean card layout with borders or subtle shadow
Make input fields mobile-friendly and large enough for touch

acceptanceCriteria: Component uses Card component from shadcn/ui or similar styling
Form fields have adequate spacing and padding
Design is mobile-first and responsive
Styling matches existing brand theme (gold/yellow, dark background, maroon accents)

requirements.text: Integrate SubmitReview component into App.tsx below the Gallery section and before the AdmissionForm section, maintaining component flow and design consistency

quotes: Place the form below the testimonials section on the page

acceptanceCriteria: SubmitReview component renders in correct position in page flow
Component inherits LanguageProvider context
No layout breaks or styling conflicts with adjacent sections

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Backend must use single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
All new text content must support bilingual switching using existing LanguageContext
nonGoals: Implementing actual review moderation interface (just store approved flag)
Displaying submitted reviews publicly on the page
